mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a substantial booklet commemorating the centennial of the First Baptist Church at Main and Henry Street, Lexington, 1867 - 1967. The new church is pictured on the front cover. The booklet includes pictures of the inside of the church, a history of the church, pictures of the old church, pictures and lists of various former and current members.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Centennial Commemoration Book, First Baptist Church, 1967
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: First Baptist Church (Lexington, Va.)
Church anniversaries
